訓.definition: to teach; to train; to admonish; (bound form) instruction (from superiors); teachings; rule

訓戒.definition: variant of 訓誡|训诫[xun4 jie4]

訓斥.definition: to reprimand; to rebuke; to berate; stern criticism

訓民正音.definition: Korean text HunMin JongUm promulgated by Sejong Daewang in 1418 to introduce hangeul

訓獸術.definition: animal training; taming wild beast (e.g. lion-taming)

訓練.definition: to train; to drill; training; CL:個|个[ge4]

訓詁.definition: to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts

訓詁學.definition: study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries

訓誡.definition: to reprimand; to admonish; to lecture sb

訓讀.definition: a reading of a written Chinese word derived from a synonym (typically, a vernacular synonym) (e.g. in Mandarin, 投子[tou2 zi5] may be pronounced as its synonym 色子[shai3 zi5], and in Wu dialects, 二 is pronounced as its synonym 兩|两 "liahn"); to pronounce a word using such a reading; (Japanese linguistics) kun-reading, a pronunciation of a kanji derived from a native Japanese word that matches its meaning rather than from the pronunciation of the character in a Sinitic language at the time it was imported from China (Note: A kun-reading of a character is distinguished from its on-reading(s) 音讀|音读[yin1 du2]. For example, 山 has a kun-reading "yama" and an on-reading "san".)
